test_message: I need to sync my academic data and get my weekly study plan. Also show me upcoming class events and study group opportunities.
expected_purpose: Manager agent that orchestrates LMS sync, study planning, and collaboration

weekly_plan.week_focus: Priority: Computer Science 101 assignment completion (due 2024-07-10) and Physics 103 midterm revision. Secondary: Address low-attendance course gaps.

attendance_alert.message: ⚠️ Mathematics 102 attendance is below 80%. Immediate catch-up sessions are scheduled.
recommended_actions: Review all recorded lectures from missed classes
Form study groups to share notes
Attend office hours to clarify concepts

peer_updates.recent_activity: Increased participation in coding practice sessions. High engagement in last group project.
Peer-led calculus tutorial held, collaborative worksheet shared.
Problem-solving breakout groups running twice weekly.

recommendations: Join open study groups for exam topics.
Schedule group sessions in your calendar.
Contribute to shared folder resources for collaboration.

result.overall_recommendations: 1. Complete Computer Science 101 assignment before Wednesday (due 2024-07-10). 2. Dedicate 15 hours to Physics 103 midterm prep this week. 3. Act on attendance alert for Mathematics 102. 4. Join/attend study groups listed for collaboration. 5. Integrate rest and wellness into your daily routine.
